price: Had We not made you stand firm, you would nearly have inclined to them a little.
arabic: وَلَوۡلَآ أَن ثَبَّتۡنَٰكَ لَقَدۡ كِدتَّ تَرۡكَنُ إِلَيۡهِمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا قَلِيلًا

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
